name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HTTPS Reporter - Mixed Content Issue Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify HTTPS Mixed Content Issues In Real-Time. Shortcut link to HTTPS Reporter logged in app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTTPS Reporter & HTTPS Checker are tools to help site owners & developers track down mixed content issues on their sites. 
This chrome app offers a quick link over the the online HTTPS Reporter app which offers real time monitoring of sites for mixed content issues reported directly from browsers as users view your site.
We also offer a free downloadable desktop app to crawl websites externally which can track down mixed content issues across your site. 
SSL is really important to protecting your site's users, but a common issue site owners have after implementing an SSL certificate is HTTPS Mixed Content warnings, which can result in the green/gold lock being crossed out in grey or red. 
Mixed content can leave users exposed to MITM attacks, tracking them down across your entire site can be tricky. These tools offer simpler ways to quickly find all mixed content warnings on your site, further protecting your HTTPS website.
